entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 11 this morning and minus 3 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Light snow beginning overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Sunday 12 March 2023
